comment: Dr. Choi is very nice and knows a lot about her field. All my negative feelings to the course aren't towards her, but more so towards the content. Make sure you put a lot of effort into the Disposition Diaries.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: She is sometimes hard to understand but she is so nice. Make sure to purchase both textbooks because you will definitely use them throughout the semester. You can tell she is very passionate about what she does. There was only a 22 point difference between an A and a B so make sure you work hard on those disposition diaries. They are worth a lot.

Dr. Choi is very caring and does the best she can for her students. She is often hard to understand and her instructions can be unclear, but just work with her and be patient and she will be as well. She is very knowledgeable in the content and strives to make it clear for her students as well.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Dr. Choi is sooo sweet! I'm not sure why there are no reviews yet! I would definitely take her, she is the best out of all ESOL teachers for INED 4483. She is caring and does not overload us with work, and she is flexible with grades and deadlines. She really wants to help us out!
